title: Need help understanding why I am banned...
body:
So I got banned permanently for being "unsportsmanlike" and usually when ive been banned before it takes 3 games of bad behavior as 3 games always shows in the ban box thingy you get after logging in again. My account however was banned for 1 game and I went 12/6 and this is what was said from me:
Game 1
In-Game
kysifviktortop: lol
kysifviktortop: box box
kysifviktortop: kindred are you trying to be bunnyfufu
kysifviktortop: did i even have to ghost
kysifviktortop: were you going for me
kysifviktortop: rengar im singed
kysifviktortop: wait so he jumps to point a
kysifviktortop: i flash to point b
kysifviktortop: adn his damage transfers to point b
kysifviktortop: seems legit
kysifviktortop: im confused
kysifviktortop: whast going on
kysifviktortop: are you guys paying attention to the map
kysifviktortop: please for the love of god
kysifviktortop: camp me or something
kysifviktortop: i am winning lane
kysifviktortop: like this sej does not know how to jg
kysifviktortop: camp your winning lanes for free gold gg ez
kysifviktortop: ojk
kysifviktortop: thats pretty neat
kysifviktortop: dont come top
kysifviktortop: ill come to you
kysifviktortop: 2v5
kysifviktortop: ?
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: 2/3
kysifviktortop: keep talking tard
kysifviktortop: how do you have 43 farm
kysifviktortop: i dont understand
kysifviktortop: yes it is
kysifviktortop: im better than you
kysifviktortop: ?
kysifviktortop: explain
kysifviktortop: 7/3
kysifviktortop: still 43 farm
kysifviktortop: um bud
kysifviktortop: farming is ez
kysifviktortop: just last hit
kysifviktortop: stupid
kysifviktortop: 45 farm 19 min
kysifviktortop: ight
kysifviktortop: ill call you when i care
kysifviktortop: mute
kysifviktortop: unintelligent waste of space and time
kysifviktortop: singed is very toxic
kysifviktortop: poisonous
kysifviktortop: its ight
kysifviktortop: talk more
kysifviktortop: kk
kysifviktortop: i think its funny to trash talk
kysifviktortop: big dmg
kysifviktortop: is the trash talking makin you feel better
kysifviktortop: wp
kysifviktortop: shouldve dodged his ult
kysifviktortop: i just wanted some farm
kysifviktortop: gg ez i carried
Post-Game
kysifviktortop: this game was like
kysifviktortop: a 1v5
kysifviktortop: wdym
kysifviktortop: everyone but ezreal was trash talkin
kysifviktortop: ezreal do you have any idea
kysifviktortop: what they were mad about
kysifviktortop: ?
kysifviktortop: um what
kysifviktortop: k
kysifviktortop: top lane dont roam
kysifviktortop: they split
kysifviktortop: i died
kysifviktortop: like
kysifviktortop: 2 times to him
kysifviktortop: all my job is to keep pressure
kysifviktortop: no onside lanes
kysifviktortop: lol
kysifviktortop: idk either
kysifviktortop: but i get poelpe like this every game
kysifviktortop: i really dont tbh
kysifviktortop: like all i do
kysifviktortop: is try my best
kysifviktortop: and people just tryna tick me off
kysifviktortop: like why does this sylas have 52 farm
kysifviktortop: at 28 min
kysifviktortop: i guess
kysifviktortop: but he still dont need to be trash talkin
 I have contacted Rito about being unbanned and as usual they give me the "oh you need to reform" automated bs please help me get unbanned.

replies.body: Where is it said that it requires three games?  The games on the cards are given as recent examples.

You've been banned before, you still have chat logs like

> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: 2/3
> kysifviktortop: keep talking tard
> kysifviktortop: stupid
> kysifviktortop: unintelligent waste of space and time
> kysifviktortop: i think its funny to trash talk

and you're not sure why you're banned? As your previous punishments explained to you, this sort of thing isn't okay.

When you've gotten multiple punishments, including chat restrictions and a temporary suspension, the next instance of behavior like this tells Riot that you're never going to improve your behavior, so they permanently ban you.

and thats where riots code of conduct needs to change if someone is harassing me like this sylas was all game while i am carrying they need to be dealt with and not me apparently 7 people reported me and i was with a pre made of 3 people... if i was with literally anybody else i guarantee i would not be banned. I have never once been banned because of inting or being the guy that starts the trash talking. This is where riot is flawed and it needs to change especially for people like me who have spent lots of money on this game.

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:24:07.735+0000)
>
> and thats where riots code of conduct needs to change if someone is harassing me like this sylas was all game while i am carrying they need to be dealt with and not me apparently 7 people reported me and i was with a pre made of 3 people... if i was with literally anybody else i guarantee i would not be banned. I have never once been banned because of inting or being the guy that starts the trash talking. This is where riot is flawed and it needs to change especially for people like me who have spent lots of money on this game.

We're not talking about someone else's behavior here. We're not talking about your K/D. We're not talking about how much money you spend. We're talking about your behavior, which was bad, as it has been on an ongoing basis, which is why you aren't being given any more opportunities to bother other players. Your refusal to admit that you did anything wrong merely confirms that banning you was the correct decision here.
but i did not do anything wrong lmfao if spamming 2/3 in chat is wrong then ping spamming is wrong ...

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:34:09.165+0000)
>
> but i did not do anything wrong lmfao if spamming 2/3 in chat is wrong then ping spamming is wrong ...

Ping spamming _is_ wrong.

You have also conveniently ignored the fact that you called people "tard," "stupid," and an "unintelligent waste of space," all while crowing about how you carried and your teammates were useless.

Your refusal to admit and correct your mistakes is why you were permabanned: Riot finally had enough.
"riot" you mean the bots had enough riot is just to busy funneling all their money into lcs because it makes them more popular none of them care about the community
They do care about the community. Hence why they banned you since you refuse to behave.
this is not growing up

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:24:07.735+0000)
>
> and thats where riots code of conduct needs to change if someone is harassing me like this sylas was all game while i am carrying they need to be dealt with and not me apparently 7 people reported me and i was with a pre made of 3 people... if i was with literally anybody else i guarantee i would not be banned. I have never once been banned because of inting or being the guy that starts the trash talking. This is where riot is flawed and it needs to change especially for people like me who have spent lots of money on this game.

Doesn’t matter if you spent $0, $5, or $371988491938298292. If you were toxic, that’s enough to warrant a ban.

Also, in the email the rioter said that the team would be looking into your case and banning the others who were toxic to you. 

Cheers!

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:24:07.735+0000)
>
> and thats where riots code of conduct needs to change if someone is harassing me like this sylas was all game while i am carrying they need to be dealt with and not me 

If someone is harassing you, mute them and use the report function at the end of the game. Participating in their flame war won't do you any good. Other people's misbehaviour cannot excuse your own.

----

>apparently 7 people reported me and i was with a pre made of 3 people... if i was with literally anybody else i guarantee i would not be banned.

It doesn't matter how many people reported you, as long as there's **one** report. That's all it takes to trigger an investigation. More change nothing.

-----

>This is where riot is flawed and it needs to change especially for people like me who have spent lots of money on this game.

Spending money doesn't unlock extra privileges. Every player is treated the same.
you could've just said 2/3 once, and you would've gotten your point across.

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-02-03T23:03:43.230+0000)
>
> you could've just said 2/3 once, and you would've gotten your point across.

It wasn't just that OP was throwing someone's score in their face; OP spammed it (as I quoted). Dumping anything repeatedly into the chat is considered inappropriate.
not necessarily. Only if it's negative is it inappropriate.

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2019-02-03T23:51:51.128+0000)
>
> not necessarily. Only if it's negative is it inappropriate.

I've seen people complaining about punishments for filling chat with "asdfjkl;" or "<3" or other nonsense. Spamming the chat is annoying (probably falling into "harassment") and punishable.
but, who are you harassing when you're spamming in team chat?

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=000200010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:17:55.489+0000)
>
> but, who are you harassing when you're spamming in team chat?

Everyone.
that's a fucking stretch.

> [{quoted}](name=BradNo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00020001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-04T00:42:20.879+0000)
>
> that's a fucking stretch.

Not really, but I can see by your recent posts why you'd disagree, so I suppose we should just leave it at that.

Because you got permabanned, you would have had to have a 14-day ban prior.

After a 14-day ban, your account is placed on thin ice. Anything negative you say to someone else can result in an instant permanent ban.

In your case, though it was on the lighter side, you were still being slightly toxic. 

“Unintelligent waste of space and time”
“Keep talking tard”
“Stupid”

Those lines were probably enough to warrant the permanent ban.

There isn’t much you can do, as riot only reverts bans if they were on accident. If you want to continue playing, you have to play on a new account.

PS: I don’t think your IGN is helping your case

Cheers!
and everything I said was in response to another insult towards me... I dont ever say that to people who dont deserve it

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:25:52.513+0000)
>
> and everything I said was in response to another insult towards me... I dont ever say that to people who dont deserve it

Just because someone insulted you, as much as it sucks, doesn’t give you the right to insult them back. You should have just muted them and continued playing.
i did continue playing and tbh i should have inted because i hard carried them and all they did is report me so they didnt deserve that win def should have inted on them

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:32:50.795+0000)
>
> i did continue playing and tbh i should have inted because i hard carried them and all they did is report me so they didnt deserve that win def should have inted on them

With that attitude, I’m not sure how you’re questioning why you were banned.

Bans are not the result of a singular chat log or game.  You would need to post the chat logs for months of game time in order for us (the boards) to know if your ban was justified or not.

All i can say is that considering how difficult I've learned it is to even get a WARNING, the ban was probably earned over a large number of reports.
I am not sure how to get all my chat logs as the ban slip gave me 1 single chat log and this has nothing wrong in it... like at all need a real rioter to look at this...

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:10:09.478+0000)
>
> I am not sure how to get all my chat logs as the ban slip gave me 1 single chat log and this has nothing wrong in it... like at all need a real rioter to look at this...

Submit a support ticket then.  The boards are a terrible place for a Rioter to examine something like this.  The Rioters here are propabaly:

 1. uninterested (so many identical posts to yours)
2. unable to do anything (Not many have the power to adjust the status of an account)
3. going to spit out the exact line i just gave you.

Submit a ticket at their official site: 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I have already done this and this is what i got TWO HOURS LATER: Hey there,

This news is going to be tough to hear, but after reviewing the account's behavior I will not be changing the decision. Know that we have a strict stance against consistent negativity, as it is offensive, and as it ruins other player's experience.

Looking at your account's history it looks like you were warned about this behavior with a previous two-week suspension. Please understand that a two-week suspension puts an account on very thin ice, and all negative behavior will need to stop immediately or the account will be permanently suspended.

I'm sorry that this game was so frustrating for you, and while it might feel like you are being singled out we will look into every player in this situation, and make sure that nothing was overlooked as it's not acceptable for players to harass you. We will look into it and take the actions we think are appropriate. You will never be told if an action has been taken against a specific player. You will from time to time receive a message stating that a player you reported has been dealt with, but that is a rare message to receive as it is random on whether or not the message is sent. However, this doesn't mean that nothing is being done about it.

I understand how frustrating this game can be at times, but it's not acceptable to berate others or insult them. Understand that we treat this type of behavior strictly as it ruins the experience for others. While these single instances of negativity would not be enough to ban your account outright. You have been persistent in this type of behavior, so a discipline was applied.

Know that each player is held responsible for their own actions, so If players are flaming you or being offensive, it's never beneficial to respond to them with flame, whether it's in self-defense or if it's out of frustration. It's always best to mute negative players and report them in the post game lobby, so you don't get disciplined as well.

Please understand that once an account is justly suspended permanently, that there is no way to regain access to the account or any of its content. Our stance is strict because we want players to take the reform process seriously.

I wish you luck moving forward on whatever game you decide to play from here.

Skeletor
Riot Games Player Support
And what's confusing about that?
absolutely everything I definitely should not be banned rn its ridiculous
You were given a very clear final warning and continued to be toxic.
wasnt toxic .

You spent almost the entire game flaming people.

It doesn't matter if they started it. It isn't allowed. Period.

then why do they do it... If they do it theyre making me do it too if IT ISNT ALLOWED PERIOD then why are they doing it to me explain when youre able to explain this i will listen. but you cant explain this

Are they holding a gun to your head and making you type? No?

Your lack of self control is **your** fault. Not anyone else's.

why are they not following the code of conduct I was following the code of conduct just fucking fine until these idiots decided to show up in my game the fact they wernt already banned is so tilting just makes me wanna drink bleach and kms

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-02T01:28:58.115+0000)
>
> why are they not following the code of conduct I was following the code of conduct just fucking fine

Doubt that. Looking at your match history there are several games that I would have a hard time believing that you weren't trolling in them. That you weren't caught for those games was a shame but now that you're banned, even if it was for different reasons, it ends up with the same result.

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-02-02T01:28:58.115+0000)
>
> why are they not following the code of conduct I was following the code of conduct just fucking fine until these idiots decided to show up in my game the fact they wernt already banned is so tilting just makes me wanna drink bleach and kms

Okay enjoy

Well, I mean, 2 hour turn around with a company serving litterally 10's of million, maybe 100's of million players is pretty dang good.

Also, just read your summoner name.  You can get an account banned for inappropriate username, and yours contains a referense to self-harm.  That alone could get an account banned.

Just a heads up though for if you make another account or move on to another game:  "your an idiot" is a toxic response, "That play was garbage" is an angry but appropriate reaction.  Plus it actually highlights what you want them to do differently.  If they proceed to become toxic themselves, mute functionality is nearly a universal constant for games.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaneShadow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:27:19.013+0000)
>
> Well, I mean, 2 hour turn around with a company serving litterally 10's of million, maybe 100's of million players is pretty dang good.
> 
> Also, just read your summoner name.  You can get an account banned for inappropriate username, and yours contains a referense to self-harm.  That alone could get an account banned.

Also, criticism and frustration should never be targeted at an individual, but that individuals actions.  "Your an idiot" is a useless and offensive response.  "that play was garbage" is not great but identifies the actual source of anger and doesn't mindlessly attack others.
they never said it was because of my username they have said to me I am being banned because of "toxic behavior"

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:30:04.981+0000)
>
> they never said it was because of my username they have said to me I am being banned because of "toxic behavior"

We aren’t saying it’s stricly due to your username. Sure, your username may have helped you get banned, but it wasn’t the main cause.

The main cause was you being toxic even after you were warned about it.
The kys in your name?
no its not that riot doesnt care about toxic usernames and my name is very true viktor top is absolutely ridiculous

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:28:32.694+0000)
>
> no its not that riot doesnt care about toxic usernames and my name is very true viktor top is absolutely ridiculous

Yes it is? It’s one of the options for reporting, as well as the fact that multiple other people have been banned/forced to change their username because of this.

It doesn’t matter if Viktor top is “op.” That doesn’t give you the right to make your username toxic like that
Honestly surprised that you weren't forced to change your name.

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:05:40.525+0000)
> kysifviktortop: keep talking tard
> kysifviktortop: im better than you
> kysifviktortop: stupid
> kysifviktortop: unintelligent waste of space and time

When you insult other players (whether they started it or not), you are in violation of the rules. Violating the rules too much earns punishment.
yeah but this was a single game.

> [{quoted}](name=kysifviktortop,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ay8O8zUr,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-02-02T00:40:57.562+0000)
>
> yeah but this was a single game.

Wrong. The reason you got a _perma_ ban is not because of this one game. It’s the entirety of your toxic history that led to this outcome. That game just served as the trigger. Chat restrictions and 14-day bans don’t reset your history, they are just warnings that if you don’t stop being toxic you will get banned. 
Let’s say your history looked like this:
1. 15 toxic chatlogs: 10 game CR
2. 10 more toxic chatslogs after the restriction ended: 25 game CR
3. After that, 5 more toxic chatlogs: 14-day ban
4. 1 last toxic chatlog: permanent ban
In the example above you wouldn’t get permanentally banned for that 1 last toxic chatlog but for the 31 logs combined. 

The chatlog you posted would, if even, probably only trigger a CR by itself but in combination with your history it resulted in a permanent suspension so saying “but this was a single game” is not a valid argument.
